verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glory and honor to God.
Glory and honor forever.
Glory and honor to God.
Glory and honor belong to Him.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He who formed the heavens,
He who knows the stars by name,
Author of all life,
Full of wisdom, full of love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who compares to You?
Who has been Your counselor?
Author of all life,
Full of wisdom, full of love.
